text: Nicoletta Orsomando (born Nicolina Orsomando; 11 January 1929 – 21 August 2021) was an Italian television personality. She was the first Italian announcer to appear on television. She presented a program for children, a documentary about the Encyclopædia Britannica. In 2010, she participated in the variety show on Rai 1 Insegnami a sognare. Orsomando died at a hospital in Rome on 21 August 2021, at the age of 92. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Italian radio personalities Category:Italian television personalities
title: Nicoletta Orsomando
